text: 3.5-6: Stt 18.12Mba fhum kegi mbigi, mba mbiga mbe khare, Sara. Sara, ana wo ndiv Fhe Bakɨme nɨɨŋgiap, ana muun zav suaŋgi bigi, ana ntan rarga ki. Mbe mba khesharigi tɨvir wari nzɨɨv, wari won mani piin ki. Sara Abraham nzuai buni zɨn vov, kha kakaman ana mbui, “Guman Rum”. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip tɨvir vhuuin muuŋv, nde bigɨn then rivɨrga fhu, nde Sarar ŋkarmbigir fara muuŋgi.
